channel.title: NHC Atlantic
channel.description: Active tropical cyclones in the Atlantic, Caribbean, and the Gulf of Mexico

item.title: Hurricane ZACK Forecast Advisory Number 8
item.description:
Issued at 2100 UTC TUE JUL 14 2015 
ZCZC MIATCMAT3 ALL
TTAA00 KNHC DDHHMM

HURRICANE ZACK FORECAST/ADVISORY NUMBER   8
NWS NATIONAL HURRICANE CENTER MIAMI FL       AL992016
2100 UTC MON APR 11 2016

THERE ARE NO COASTAL WATCHES OR WARNINGS IN EFFECT.

TROPICAL STORM CENTER LOCATED NEAR 25.5N  73.0W AT 11/2100Z
POSITION ACCURATE WITHIN  30 NM

PRESENT MOVEMENT TOWARD THE NORTHEAST OR  50 DEGREES AT  18 KT

ESTIMATED MINIMUM CENTRAL PRESSURE 980 MB
MAX SUSTAINED WINDS 75 KT WITH GUSTS TO 95 KT.
34 KT.......150NE 150SE 150SW 150NW.
12 FT SEAS..220NE 180SE 100SW 180NW.
WINDS AND SEAS VARY GREATLY IN EACH QUADRANT.  RADII IN NAUTICAL
MILES ARE THE LARGEST RADII EXPECTED ANYWHERE IN THAT QUADRANT.

REPEAT...CENTER LOCATED NEAR 25.5N  73.0W AT 11/2100Z
AT 11/1800Z CENTER WAS LOCATED NEAR 25.5N  73.0W

FORECAST VALID 12/0600Z 25.5N  74.9W
MAX WIND  75 KT...GUSTS  85 KT.
34 KT...150NE 150SE 150SW 150NW.

FORECAST VALID 12/1800Z 25.4N  77.2W
MAX WIND  75 KT...GUSTS  95 KT.
34 KT...150NE 150SE 150SW 150NW.

FORECAST VALID 13/0600Z 25.6N  80.2W
MAX WIND  80 KT...GUSTS 95 KT.
34 KT...160NE 160SE 160SW 160NW.

FORECAST VALID 13/1800Z 26.0N  82.6W
MAX WIND  92 KT...GUSTS 110 KT.
34 KT...180NE 180SE 180SW 180NW.

FORECAST VALID 14/1800Z 27.3N  86.4W
MAX WIND 115 KT...GUSTS 125 KT.
34 KT...230NE 230SE 230SW 230NW.

EXTENDED OUTLOOK. NOTE...ERRORS FOR TRACK HAVE AVERAGED NEAR 150 NM
ON DAY 4 AND 200 NM ON DAY 5...AND FOR INTENSITY NEAR 15 KT EACH DAY

OUTLOOK VALID 15/1800Z 29.9N  90.9W
MAX WIND 126 KT...GUSTS 140 KT.

OUTLOOK VALID 16/1800Z 32.2N  94.3W
MAX WIND  86 KT...GUSTS 100 KT.

REQUEST FOR 3 HOURLY SHIP REPORTS WITHIN 300 MILES OF 23.4N  73.7W

NEXT ADVISORY AT 01/1500Z


NNNN
item.author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
